See my [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=JzcfhPsAAAAJ&view_op=list_works&sortby=title&inst=10163712085368340378) and [Arxiv](https://arxiv.org/a/mathis_c_1.html) for a full list.
